name: DevConnect
description: A social platform for developers with real-time chat, JWT authentication, RESTful APIs, and automated email notifications. Deployed on AWS EC2 with Nginx and PM2 for high availability.

name: XpenseMate
description: A full-stack personal finance manager to track expenses, manage budgets, and visualize spending. Features include authentication, transaction management, receipt OCR, analytics dashboard, and responsive UI.

name: CodeTales
description: A modern AI-powered blogging platform with secure admin panel, dynamic blog creation, category management, and AI-assisted content generation using Google Gemini AI. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB for a seamless reading and publishing experience.

name: FitMe AI
description: A personalized AI fitness assistant that creates tailored workout and diet plans using advanced conversational AI and voice interactions, offering real-time program generation and secure user management.

name: ChitChat
description: A real-time messaging app for seamless worldwide communication. With user search, online status, and message timestamps, it's designed for efficient chatting anytime, anywhere.

name: Find_Your_Recipe
description: This React app lets users quickly find recipes by entering a food item's name. Selecting a recipe redirects them to a YouTube video for easy, step-by-step cooking instructions.

name: To-do-List
description: This web-based to-do list app, built with React, helps you stay organized by allowing you to add, update, and mark tasks as completed. Its clean and user-friendly interface makes managing daily tasks simple and efficient.

name: Portfolio
description: A simple and responsive personal portfolio website to share my work, skills, and projects. Built with care using modern web technologies and a touch of smooth animations for a pleasant user experience.

name: libra-link
description: Libra Link is a MERN stack project where users can discover books, log in, and upload their own books. It offers a simple platform for book sharing and exploration.

name: Password-generator
description: This React app generates secure passwords with customizable length and character types (letters, numbers, special characters) and allows users to copy them to the clipboard. The UI is responsive and user-friendly.

name: Notes
description: This code builds a simple note-taking app where users can add, edit, and delete notes. It supports Markdown formatting, displaying rendered content when not in edit mode. A basic example of dynamic content using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Nike-Landing-Page
description: Explore the Nike Landing Page â€“ a fusion of sleek design and smooth Framer Motion animations for an immersive user experience. With seamless loading and eye-catching tsParticles effects, this site sets a new benchmark for interactive design. Clean, dynamic, and captivating.
